mapper.insert: insert into corporation(corporationmember_id,mt_id, corporationmember_name, corporationmember_passwd,corporationmember_email, corporation_name, corporation_postcode,corporation_address, corporationmember_phone, corporation_url, corporation_photo, corporation_registration, corporation_registrationpdf, corporation_intro, corporation_verified) values (#{corporationMemberId}, #{mtId}, #{corporationMemberName}, #{corporationMemberPasswd}, #{corporationMemberEmail}, #{corporationName}, #{corporationPostcode}, #{corporationAddress}, #{corporationMemberPhone}, #{corporationUrl}, #{corporationPhoto}, #{corporationRegistration}, #{corporationRegistrationPdf}, #{corporationIntro}, #{corporationVerified} )
